name: Projectile Guardian
description:
Defend the impenetrable fortress from incoming enemy missiles! Send your own missiles hurtling towards your enemies with the tap of a finger!

Projectile Guardian is more about killing time than missiles. Should you find yourself waiting for a flight, bus, or maybe your significant other is taking a while getting ready for that big dinner, load up a game of Projectile Guardian and blow a few minutes watching some colorful particles fly across your mobile screen.
